title: TREX Introduces TREX SIGNATURE DECKING | ProBuilder - Pro Builder
summary: Trex introduces Trex Signature decking, a premium composite decking with realistic woodgrain for beauty, performance, and sustainability.
green_innovation: TRUE. This is a green innovation because Trex Signature decking is sustainable, made from recycled materials, and aims to reduce environmental impact.
business_innovation: TRUE. This is a business innovation as Trex introduces a new premium composite decking material that differs significantly from its previous products.
green_product: TRUE. Trex Signature decking is designed to significantly reduce its environmental impact throughout its life cycle, using environmentally benign materials and sustainable production processes.
green_process: FALSE. The article discusses a new product innovation (Trex Signature decking) rather than a green process in manufacturing or production.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 321918 (Other Millwork), 326199 (All Other Plastics Product Manufacturing), 444190 (Other Building Material Dealers), 423310 (Lumber, Plywood, Millwork, and Wood Panel Merchant Wholesalers)
greenwashing: FALSE. The article does not exhibit greenwashing as it highlights the sustainable attributes of Trex Signature decking without any false or misleading environmental claims.
